0100101110000001 1011111001011101 1 -> sum: 0000100111011111, cout: 1

1000001001110000 0110110101101010 0 -> sum: 1110111111011010, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
